Given the context and the action-result history, please complete the task mentioned. Include any links you used from the context and history in the result.
Task: Tell me a fact about Star Trek: The Next Generation?
Result:

output: One interesting fact about Star Trek: The Next Generation is that it originally aired from 1987 to 1994 and is set in the 24th century, about 100 years after the original Star Trek series. The show follows the adventures of the Starship Enterprise and its crew, led by Captain Jean-Luc Picard. It is known for its exploration of moral and ethical dilemmas, as well as its groundbreaking special effects for the time.\n\nFor more information, you can visit the official Star Trek website: https://www.startrek.com/
